text: Juan Carlos Guerra Zunzunegui (1 February 1935 - 28 September 2020) was a Spanish politician and lawyer. Guerra Zunzunegui was born in Madrid. He was a member of the People's Party. From 1977 to 1986, he was a member of the Senate. Between 1986 to 2008, he was in the Congress of Deputies. Guerra Zunzunegui died on 28 September 2020 in Madrid, aged 85.Fallece a los 85 a√±os Juan Carlos Guerra Zunzunegui, exsenador y exdiputado del PP ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish lawyers Category:Politicians from Madrid
title: Juan Carlos Guerra Zunzunegui
